name: Path of Thorns
description:
Path of Thorns is a puzzle game prototype that we made during Ludum Dare 31. We started when there was less than 48h left for the Jam and had to go with something simple.

Character moves using WASD or arrow keys. Once character starts moving, she won't stop until she meets an obstacle. There are 8 short puzzle levels with increasing difficulty. Can you guide her home?
